mv X y.go
-- x.go --
package p

import "m/q"

func X() int {
	return q.Q + Y
}

var _ = X()
-- y.go --
package p

var Y int
-- q/q.go --
package q

var Q int
-- stdout --
diff old/x.go new/x.go
--- old/x.go
+++ new/x.go
@@ -2,8 +2,4 @@

 import "m/q"

-func X() int {
-	return q.Q + Y
-}
-
 var _ = X()
diff old/y.go new/y.go
--- old/y.go
+++ new/y.go
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
 package p

+import "m/q"
+
 var Y int
+
+func X() int {
+	return q.Q + Y
+}
